        Cleaning a String from unnecessary characters.

      • generateCorpusDictionaryFromFile

        public abstract void generateCorpusDictionaryFromFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                                    DictHandling dicthandler,
                                    boolean wholecorpus)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a dictionary out of a given annotated corpus.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the annotated corpus
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to store the dictionary
        wholecorpus - indicates if the whole corpus should be used as a dictionary or if a test set should be generated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error
